items.title: Brothers charged with South African rapper's murder after extradition
items.description: The Ndimande brothers returned after a lengthy battle to block their extradition from Eswatini.

items.title: Wife and son of Gabon's ousted leader given 20-year jail terms in two-day corruption trial
items.description: They were not in court and have described the charges against them as “a legal farce”.

items.title: Trump says he has 'obligation' to sue BBC over speech edit
items.description: The US president indicates he will go ahead with a lawsuit against the BBC over how his speech was presented by Panorama.

items.title: Fog helps Russian forces push deeper into key Ukrainian city of Pokrovsk
items.description: A video has gone viral showing Russian soldiers openly driving into the city on civilian cars and motorbikes.

items.title: Watch: Australian windsurfer escapes shark attack
items.description: Andy McDonald recalls moment he encountered a shark while windsurfing in Western Australia this week.
